data.comment: The match has started, with Rio Ave kicking-off.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Gustavo Correia signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 7, Rio Ave's Carlos Mane has run offside.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
Carlos Mane for Rio Ave drives towards goal at Estadio do Restelo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Diego Lopes for the away team is judged to be offside.
Gustavo Correia signals a throw-in for Belenenses, close to Rio Ave's area.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Toni Borevkovic for Rio Ave has been booked by Gustavo Correia and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 16, Belenenses's Afonso Sousa looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Attention is being given to Belenensesâ€™s Afonso Sousa and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Rio Ave.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
In the minute 19, Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
In the minute 21, Mateo Cassierra for Belenenses is whistled offside.
Gustavo Correia awards the home team a throw-in.
Rio Ave pushes forward through Andre Pereira, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 23, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Rio Ave.
Belenenses's Ruben Lima misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 24, Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Rio Ave drives forward and Andre Pereira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 27, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
In Lisbon, Stanislav Kritsyuk (Belenenses) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 28, Gustavo Correia awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
In the minute 31, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio do Restelo.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Belenenses.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses drive forward but Silvestre Varela is judged offside.
In the minute 35, Rio Ave have a dangerous throw-in.
Andre Pereira's header is off-target for Rio Ave.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
In the minute 36, Gustavo Correia signals a Belenenses throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 39, Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 45, Belenenses are pushing forward but Bruno Ramires's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Rio Ave.
The first-half has ended.
Henrique (Belenenses) has received a yellow card from Gustavo Correia.
In the minute 46, Belenenses have kicked-off the second half at Estadio do Restelo.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio do Restelo.
Free kick Rio Ave.
In the minute 47, Gustavo Correia awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Afonso Sousa of Belenenses gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 49, Gustavo Correia signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Gustavo Correia awards Belenenses a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rio Ave defender.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Rio Ave.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Gustavo Correia awards the home team a throw-in.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Estadio do Restelo, Aderllan Santos has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Rio Ave will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Belenenses.
In the minute 59, Afonso Sousa hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Belenenses in Lisbon.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Belenenses's Afonso Taira attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio do Restelo.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Rio Ave.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 64, Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 65, Gama (Rio Ave) is making a first substitution, with Gelson Dala replacing Diego Lopes.
Gama is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Restelo with Chico Geraldes replacing Lucas Piazon.
In the minute 66, Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Belenenses have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Gustavo Correia signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Belenenses.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
In the minute 73, The away team replace Andre Pereira with Bruno Moreira.
Edi Semedo is replacing Mateo Cassierra for the home team.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gelson Dala of Rio Ave is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 77, Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Belenenses's Afonso Taira has been booked in Lisbon.
Belenenses's Edi Semedo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Restelo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave's Pele breaks free at Estadio do Restelo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 85, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Gustavo Correia signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Rio Ave make their fourth substitution with Tarantini replacing Pele.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Carlos Mane with Ryotaro Meshino. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gama.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Caue is on a sub for Phete for Belenenses.
Francisco Teixeira is replacing Silvestre Varela for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
The home team have replaced Afonso Sousa with Robinho. This is the fourth substitution made today by Petit.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
In the minute 87, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 88, Belenenses are coming forward and Francisco Teixeira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio do Restelo.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 89, Gustavo Correia blows against Rio Ave's Gelson Dala for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Rio Ave are pushing forward but Gelson Dala's finish is wide of the goal.
Gustavo Correia awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
